definition: filled or abounding with clouds, a cast that falls beyond the intended spot, sew with an overcast stitch from one section to the next
details:
adjective
- filled or abounding with clouds
= synonyms: clouded
noun
- a cast that falls beyond the intended spot
- a long whipstitch or overhand stitch overlying an edge to prevent raveling
= synonyms: overcasting
- gloomy semidarkness caused by cloud cover
= synonyms: cloudiness
- the state of the sky when it is covered by clouds
= synonyms: cloudiness, cloud cover
verb
- sew with an overcast stitch from one section to the next
= example: sew with an overcast stitch from one section to the next
- sew over the edge of with long slanting wide stitches
- make overcast or cloudy
= example: make overcast or cloudy
= synonyms: cloud
